section.title:
accounts payable
payables journal
payables journal
printing of
payables journal
reprinting of Payables Journal
section.para: When posting Vouchers in batch mode, you are given the option to print a Payables Journal. To print a Payables Journal, select the "Payables Journal" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing a Payables Journal, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the number of the Payables Journal you want to print. Payables Journals are created when Vouchers are posted. The Journal Number you select will include both the Payable Journal Number and also the date when the Vouchers were posted.
